name: Área de Autocaravanas Sabiñánigo
title: (22609) Área de Autocaravanas Sabiñánigo
description:
The City Council has enabled 12 endowed places.
There are about 60 seats approx.
A maximum stay of 48 continuous hours per week is allowed.
The car park is open all year, EXCEPT the weekend of the Quebrantahuesos Cycling Tour (usually the third weekend of June) and other mass celebrations such as BMW Motorrad or those considered by the Sabiñánigo City Council.
It is located in the parking lot of the Pirenarium facilities, Avenida del Ejército 27 and has direct access from the A-23 motorway, through exit 406 Boltaña-Fiscal-Sabiñánigo. Taking the fourth exit at the roundabout, towards Sabiñánigo. Continuing along Boulevard Antonio Muñoz Loriente and taking the first exit at the next roundabout or arriving at Avda. Ejército through the access to the Pirenarium Parking.
The spaces are reserved only for motorhomes, without being able to park other types of vehicles such as trucks, cars, vans, caravans, etc. The only use of electrical outlet, water or emptying, without parking, entails the payment of the rate.
Users must obtain the corresponding parking voucher that will be issued by a parking meter enabled for this purpose, after payment of the fee.

name: EL ARREBOL Comfort Camp
title: (22714) EL ARREBOL Comfort Camp
description: The Arrebol Comfort Camp is a new pet-friendly campsite in Jaca with 12 Nordic-style bungalows and 68 camping pitches of 70 and 100 square meters for tents, caravans and motorhomes. All the pitches have electricity and water connections and there is a sewage area for motorhomes available. All services are brought together in the central building: changing rooms, bathrooms, showers, laundry, sinks, reception, shop and restaurant with chill-out terrace. The leisure area is made up of a beautiful sand pool, a barbecue, a children's area and a dog release area with a pool depending on the time of year. From any point of the campsite you can enjoy the best views of Peña Oroel.

Before you can drive directly to the water you have to go through a gate that was open to us. Both places go without a 4x4, but high clearance is required. With 4x4 it is still better.

description:
Planduviar Plains 4 km south of Broto. A very nice place, with benches and picnic tables, and even a football field. I find thanks to the Tourist Office.
NO overnight parking

name: Área Ordesa Pirineos
title: (22373) Área Ordesa Pirineos
description:
In the Ordesa Pirineos Area we have a water supply, gray and black water drainage, free WiFi, the site is completely fenced, the plots are large, grassy and well delimited.

Tables, chairs and awnings can be removed. There are also surveillance cameras. And you can enter and leave the area as many times as you want during the duration of your reservation.

Price: €12/night.

--->>>RECOMMENDATION<<<---

Come with the reservation made to speed up the time to enter the area, avoid possible queues and secure your place in our area with the reservation.

To reserve your space you must download the Pverde application, register, add your payment method, select "I want to park my motorhome", search for "Ordesa Pirineos Area", click on the name of the parking lot, reserve the number of nights and click on "Book ".

When you are at the entrance to the area, you just have to open the application, click on the area and the screen will show the three ways to enter with the application:
1- Pressing the button that says "Click to open".
2 - Put the code on the keyboards that are in the columns.
3- Call the number that appears in the application with the reservation.

IMPORTANT: You must ALWAYS wait outside the yellow square for the barrier to close, when it is closed, you must go towards the yellow square to open the barrier with the Pverde app.

*** Check In from 12 noon and Check Out until 12 noon. *** Maximum length of vehicles - 9 meters

Video: Tax town enchanted by the region and its clients - Pyrenees region of Ordesa

title: (22662) Hoz de Jaca - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet sleeping place directly at the reservoir. Driving only with 4x4. Observe water level. Space only usable if reservoir is relatively low. Water clean, bathing possible.

title: (22374) Broto - N-260
description: A huge esplanade with a lot of space for caravans and vans. In one area has picnic tables.

title: (22661) Panticosa - Avenida Sabocos
description: Spectacular place with views of the Ibon de Sabocos y Asnos. Only 4x4. Impossible to stop AC

title: (22710) Castiello de Jaca - N-330
description: Quiet place in the street of the river, difficult access pebbles

title: (22710) Castiello de Jaca - Unnamed Road
description: A flat lot next to an abandoned church. Beautiful views, no services, mandatory 4x4. there is a sign limited to 3 tons.

title: (22374) Sarvisé -
description: Quiet and safe place to spend the night, the last meters are on a dirt track but it is in perfect condition.

title: (22374) Broto - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place on the river and 10 minutes walk from the village square. The road there is a dirt road

title: (22377) Fragen - 34 Calle Real
description: Public fountain in front of the cemetery. for vans or AC it is not easy to access because the streets are narrow, but you can park in a square a little earlier and fill water there. we did it with carafe and funnel. It is not the most comfortable but if you are in a hurry, you have water.

title: (22700) Jaca - N-240
description: Picnic place with tables (10) and with space to park around 12 vehicles. Lots of shade. Containers for garbage cans.

title: (22370) Oto - 41 Calle la Peña
description: Motorhome area attached and managed by Camping OTO. the use of the area is available from 8:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m., and includes all the services of the campsite except the pool, which is closed at the specified time. Showers with hot water and WC's available. Bar Restaurant and supermarket also available in the campsite itself, playground and other services of a campsite, including WIFI, is undoubtedly the best option for overnight in the valley of Broto (Ordesa).

name: Camping Oto
title: (22370) Camping Oto
description: Broto, 10 Calle Batán. Camping Oto. Nice grassy area, clean facilities, soccer, playground, Restaurant and Bar. Aroma from nearby dairy farm.

title: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
title_short: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
description: Esplanade in the middle of the very flat forest and overlooking the mountains. It is very close to the road and cars are heard, but for one night it is fine.

title: (22374) Broto - N-260
description: Good place to sleep about four 4x4s. Plain and next to the river. 4x4 access

title: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
title_short: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
description: Place next to the rest area, just in front of the road where the area is located, there is a small clearing on a road

title: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
title_short: (22663) Sallent de Gállego - Carretera Huesca a Francia
description: Rest area with tables, shade and views of the reservoir.

title: (22370) Broto -
description:
Quiet place with the river nearby.
In summer the sun shines until late so there is no shade.

To arrive in the afternoon, be quiet.

title: (22374) Broto - N-260
description: Nice place to spend the night without disturbing anyone. By the river. Access by dirt road in good condition from the Asador. Space only for one vehicle.

title: (22374) Sarvisé - 4 Urbanización Robles los
description: Picnic area by the road but calm, under the trees several tables, trash available and small water fountain, departure for hikes.

title: (22375) Buesa -
description: After a small track in good condition accessible from Sarvisé, a short descent to the right and a small stream fording (with water in June) we access two fields and an area under centuries-old trees and a clear-water estuary. Access could be possible by van with height.

title: (22374) Broto - Calle Única
description: Quiet place, next to a road, to sleep without disturbing anyone, but without more ... only small and large volume vans, no ac.

title: (22370) Broto - N-260
description: Fantastic spot by the river, with no o e around. Just at the very end of the road where it becomes a walking path. Best for high clearance or 4x4, but I still managed with the MarcoPolo. The river a bit noisy but a great lonely spot

title: (22370) Broto - 6 Calle E
description: Small corner to camp in 2 or 3 van by the river. Peaceful place. Forbidden at night

title: (22370) Broto - 10 Calle Batán
description: Picnic with parking next to the river and the town of Broto (there is a pedestrian bridge that goes to the town (with supermarket, pharmacy, bars, ...). Very quiet area. The area also has several tables and benches.

title: (22370) Broto - 35 Calle Porches
description: Parking only for the day. You can't spend the night. Good place to visit the Sorrosal waterfall or climb the via ferratas. Maneuvering can be difficult for oversized motorhomes

title: (22370) Broto - 30 Calle Santa Cruz
description: Parking by the river near the pools. 3 motorhomes fit, without services.

title: (22370) Broto - N-260a
description: Parking located in the village of Broto, a good place to learn about their surroundings, nearby there is a water pipe along the road to the city, parking is very quiet and has skips. very close to the municipal swimming pool open in summer only.

title: (22150) Caldearenas - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet viewpoint for overnight with SUV, 4x4, the road is well. It is accessed by Arguis direction Belsue. When you reach the manzanera tunnel take the road to Sierra de Bonés.esta near Belsue, Nocito, Arguis.Pone that is Caldearenas but it is accessed by ARGUIS.

title: (22663) Tramacastilla de Tena - 9 Carretera Comarcal 136
description: Public parking for vehicles in general Tramacastilla

title: (22860) - 15 Diseminado Partidas
description: Small area with fountain and a couple of tables, shade and quiet, away from the road and on the way to the Camino de Santiago.

title: (22700) Jaca - 26 Calle Mayor
description: Parking donen the town to sleep and start a trekking to the tower.

title: (22372) San Juste - 9 Calle Única
description: Small flat land next to the town. Perfect for an overnight stay. Very quiet and pleasant.

title: (22370) Broto - 1 Calle Porches
description: It is a picnic area with tables and swings by the river. A car can be reached and there is an area next to the picnic area to park flat and wide for about 4 or 5 vehicles. There is a fountain before arriving. To arrive once the street ends we follow the road and in a few meters we have the picnic area.

title: (22370) Broto -
description: A few kilometers from Torla, small spot with a view. Access by track in fairly good condition… space for 3 vans if you squeeze a little… on the other hand mosquitoes and wasps.

title: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca -
description: Beautiful point to spend a night with incredible views. Little space, ideal for 2 small campers. Very quiet night despite being close to the road. Be careful in winter, since this access road is not maintained.

title: (22860) Castiello de Jaca - N-330
description: Picnic area small but with ... big shade trees. Overhanging the road.

title: (22663) - 14 Diseminado Tramacastilla y Sandinies
description: Repsol gas station with an area fill up water.

title: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca - 15 Diseminado Afueras
title_short: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca - 15 Diseminado Afueras
description: Beautiful shaded and quiet area, 3 picnic tables on concrete slabs. Very calm night at the end of July. Location on the edge of a small road with very little traffic, overlooking a torrent. An old path cut into the side of the cliff is located right next to it (no access found). Be careful, the road to the south is winding and very narrow in places, which can be a problem for tall motorhomes.

title: (22870) Villanúa - Camino Viejo de Orbil
description: Away from the town but close to villanua; without shadow; no services; with some banks; little space; flat; enough to spend a night or eat if there is no sun

title: (22870) Villanúa - E-7
description: Picnic area with shade to rest and eat something. There are no services.

title: (22870) Villanúa - 84 Camino Huertos
description: Quiet place above Villanua on the road that goes up to the Collorada massif, at the tar / track ... Picnic area with benches and wooden table .. We have already slept once, no problem . And tonight the civil guardia just passed and did not tell us anything, so in principle, it's good

title: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca - 49 Afueras
description: Parking with about 10-15 spaces next to the soccer field. Quiet area at night. In the morning departure point for motorized paragliders. very nice views

title: (22700) Jaca - Antigua Carretera a Jaca
description: Calm place close to main road, chairs, tables, shadow....

title: (22870) Villanúa - N-330
description: Picnic area with dining tables. large esplanade of smooth parking. roadside. little shade in summer.

title: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca - 1 Calle Baja
title_short: (22662) El Pueyo de Jaca - 1 Calle Baja
description: El Pueyo de Jaca, (Huesca) municipal parking lot for vehicles in general, including RVs and RVs. Notice at the entrance to the city. Good starting point for excursions into the high and low mountain ranges. There is a big zip line, very spectacular. Good home cooked food in the restaurant, cheap tank

title: (22870) Villanúa - 7 Calle Piscinas
description: Parking at the edge of the river, just in front of the municipal swimming pools (bridge to cross). Very quiet for the day (even if it's summer and the pools are open, parking is not full) and night. No problem for all sizes of motorhome. Near the caves of Güixas.

title: (22870) Villanúa -
description: Fuel station. Possibility of filling the water tank. Free.

title: (22870) Villanúa - Calle Ricardo Compairé
description: Parking at the village swimming pools. Very calm. You have a lot of trekking routes in the area and a playground next to it. Watch out for motorhomes of 6 m and over the village is complicated. However, there are many places to park. Quiet !

title: (22150) Lúsera -
description: Beautiful places on a river (former reservoir) where you can stand freely. There are trees and shrubs that provide shade. No facilities and only suitable for 4x4 vans or jeeps / land rovers.

title: (22150) Lúsera -
description: Small car park near the road. Very quiet we spent the night there. In nature. Failing to be able to spend the night in the parking lot that leads to the water basins.

name: Camping Panticosa
title: (22661) Camping Panticosa
description: Small quiet campsite, few very clean pitches, restaurant bar on site

title: (22711) Jaca - A-1603
description: Place for a car or van, beautiful view, close to the road but very little traffic, no shade.

title: (22372) Fiscal - N-260
description: Riverside, very calm. We stayed here for one night. Attention muddy access if rain ...

title: (22661) - 25 Acceso Telesilla
description: Parking Panticosa ski resort, several places reserved for motorhomes and near the ticket offices and gondola is worth it. Beware, if it snows, get out of the car park, it's a pretty steep ramp.

title: (22661) Panticosa - Calle Zocheras
description: On the right side of the road there are many parkings diagonally, but the car was too protruding, so at the end of these places there is more space but without delimiting, in which we parked in parallel without problem. The free ski bus is always happening, but if you do not tell them to stop, they do not stop. A good alternative if you do not want to leave it in the mud parked at the beginning, or the ski lifts are full.

title: (22661) Panticosa - 23A Calle Acceso Telesilla
description:
Pressure washer area with no height limit. Emptying of gray water, black water and free water recharge.
Located at the top of the first parking lot in the background.

title: (22376) Torla-Ordesa - 2 Avenida de Ordesa
description: Ordesa interpretation center parking, without services. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (22711) Botaya -
description: Small nice place in the middle of nature with a 360° view. Take the lower path to get there. Very quiet and remember to collect your waste to keep the place clean.

title: (22150) Nueno - Unnamed Road
description: 4 km before descending to Nocito, a flat area at the start of the hike to the hermitage of Sescun for 1 night, quiet with the sound of cow bells

title: (22661) Panticosa - 8 Calle San Miguel
description: Self-service laundry

title: (22150) Arguis - 13 Calle Cno. Bones
description: Pleasant places with a view of the lake, beware of a small climb

title: () -
description: At the entrance of the town. A charming town and very friendly people. There is a fount.

title: (22150) Arguis - 4 Calle los Escoderos
description: Quiet place near the Arguis reservoir. With children's area. Good views and bin for waste. We only ate.

title: (22372) Ligüerre de Ara -

title: (22376) Torla-Ordesa - 0 Avenida de Ordesa
description: The street is quiet without much traffic and a 5-minute walk from Torla

title: (22150) Arguis - Unnamed Road
description: We went there because we were not convinced about the recommended sites in this area. It is a viewpoint to Arguís located on a rural road and has a picnic table. Very quiet area to rest and / or spend the night although you can hear the cars from the main road. Beautiful place to see the stars and listen to nature.

title: (22150) Arguis - 65 Cañada Carretera
description: Large parking with flat areas on the top. Without access difficulties for any type of vehicle. Super quiet night. Little shade.

title: (22376) Torla-Ordesa - s/n Avenida de Ordesa
description: Small esplanade next to a warehouse and some garbage containers, the race is close, but there is privacy and it is quiet at night.

title: (22660) Escarrilla - 7 Calle Vico
description: Source

title: (22150) - 85 Cañada Carretera
description: Very quiet to spend a night, without shade

title: (22821) Rasal - Unnamed Road
description: Flat location, next to a small church and the river. Very quiet, enough to fall asleep with the sound of the river in the background. Attention fording, only suitable for 4x4 or equipped van. Please keep this place clean and quiet.

title: (22150) Arguis - 9 Urbanización la Foz
